lines:
Gwaille Ghuy: Hail, young adventurer!
I am Gwaille Ghuy, a helpful golden chanterelle!
Fungus McShroom: We've met before, Guile.
Gwaille Ghuy: I feel you're pronunciation is off.
Fungus McShroom: *your
Gwaille Ghuy: Man, you're such a-

Fungus McShroom: Fun guy, I get it.
That joke was old before I woke up in this funky world!

Gwaille Ghuy: Not what I was going to say.
Anyway, can I teach you a spell?
Fungus McShroom: Who starts a conversation that way?
Gwaille Ghuy: What would you describe as your biggest weakness? Your body or your mind?

options.text: I tend to get hurt a lot.
I'd prefer to become more experienced.

lines: Fungus McShroom: Odd and intrusive question, but I tend to get hurt a lot.

Gwaille Ghuy: This Rejuvenation spell takes a long time to replenish,
but it is much more potent than Guile's version.
Fungus McShroom: Thanks!

Fungus McShroom: Even though I can easily see through your little riddle,
I'd prefer to become more experienced.

Gwaille Ghuy: Just equip this bad boy and gain
more experience when killing crystals. Easy as pie!
Fungus McShroom: Thanks!
Gwaille Ghuy: Hey, McShroom! What can I do for you?

options.text: How do you know my name?
How do you pronounce your name?

lines: Fungus McShroom: How do you know my name?

Gwaille Ghuy: What do you mean?
You look silly but delicious, like a "McShroom".
Fungus McShroom: ...
Gwaille Ghuy: Wait, that's actually your name? That's hilarious!
Fungus McShroom: Let's pretend this exchange never happened.

Gwaille Ghuy: All right. Next time you ask,
I'll pretend not to know and say the exact same things.
Fungus McShroom: Where are we?

Gwaille Ghuy: We're in the north tower of Castle Cakeworld,
east of the Minty Mountains!

Gwaille Ghuy: Did you know that, in ancient times,
Castle Cakeworld was full of hidden tunnels?
Gwaille Ghuy: In times of war, mushrooms would flee through them!

Fungus McShroom: You mean there once were more
mushrooms than just you guys?
Gwaille Ghuy: Let's just say I like to kill two birds with one stone.
Fungus McShroom: We... are talking about your brothers, right?
Gwaille Ghuy: Come again?
Fungus McShroom: Never mind.
Fungus McShroom: How do you pronounce your name?
Gwaille Ghuy: Gwaille Ghuy.
